description: This file defines a mock class 'FrontPanelConfigMock' for unit testing, which mocks the 'device::FrontPanelConfigImpl' interface. It includes mock methods for accessing front panel indicators and text displays, leveraging the Google Mock framework.

classes.name: FrontPanelConfigMock
classes.description: Mock class for 'device::FrontPanelConfigImpl' providing mocked methods for front panel indicator and display retrieval.

methods.name: getIndicators
methods.description: Mock method returning a list of front panel indicators.

methods.name: getTextDisplay (by name)
methods.description: Mock method returning a reference to a text display identified by name.

methods.name: getTextDisplay (by id)
methods.description: Mock method returning a reference to a text display identified by id.

methods.name: getTextDisplay
methods.description: Mock method returning a reference to a default text display.

methods.name: getTextDisplays
methods.description: Mock method returning a list of text displays.
